results.title: Love now pay later
results.creator_credit: Pauline Shaw and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Facts Are These”.
An introductory description of the increasing incidence of venereal disease. A consultant surgeon of a London VD Clinic explains the range of causative factors.

results.title: In a cleaner greener land
results.creator_credit: Pauline Shaw and Granada International Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Facts Are These”.
This film deals with the enormous problems of pollution of the air, the water and the land. All three are dealt with in detail but the pollution of the air is given greater attention in this timely film.

results.title: Fixed for death
results.creator_credit: Pauline Shaw and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Facts Are These”.
Investigates drug addiction among the under twenties. Includes group discussion with registered addicts at a hospital in Birmingham, showing their apathy and disgust. Considers the effects on the families of addicts. Points out the dangers of becoming hooked by experimentation.

results.title: The Drug takers
results.creator_credit: Pauline Shaw and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Facts Are These”.
A study of drug misuse among the young people of a typical urban area. Considers the social acceptability and medical uses of certain types of drugs and the effects of some drugs on the workings of the body. An ex-addict discusses his experiences. Finally a psychiatrist warns of the dangers inherent in casual experimentation.

results.title: Contraception
results.creator_credit: Pauline Shaw and Granada Television International
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Facts Are These”.
The most important aspect of family planning is to avoid the unwanted child. Baroness Birk describes to young people the irresponsibility of creating such a child and the damaging psychological, radical and social effects on both the child and the parents. Advice for young people on all types of sexual matters is provided by Family Planning Association Clinics and Brooke Advisory Centre. An animated sequence on the mechanic of conception is included.

results.title: Another little drink
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Facts Are These”.
Opens with groups of people enjoying a social evening in a pub and using alcohol sensibly. An animated sequence follows which corrects commonly held misconceptions about alcohol and details its effects on the brain and the senses. The work of a hospital Alcoholism Treatment Unit is detailed and a psychiatrist explains the stages in the treatment of alcoholics admitted to the Unit and we look in on a group undergoing treatment. The important role of organisations such as Alcoholics Anonymous and regional councils on alcoholism is stressed.

results.title: Another day of healing
results.creator_credit: Graham Bye, Leon Bram, Associated World and Film Partnership (Vic.)
results.brief_description: In an attempt to cater for the medical needs of over 200,000 people annually, the Austin Hospital works twenty-four hours a day. The film shows the activities of all the departments of the Hospital and briefly tells some of its history. Written by John Hindle.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Graham Bye, Leon Bram, Associated World and Film Partnership (Vic.)

results.title: Animations in the studio
results.creator_credit: Lawrie Lawler and Centre for Educational Television Overseas
results.brief_description: Examines the construction lighting and use of a simple slide animation which allows a sequence of words or symbols to be revealed on the screen at exactly the right moment. Also demonstrates moire fringes, the use of magnets and complicated cardboard animations.

results.title: Animation pie
results.brief_description: A group of high school students go through the processes and experiences of making several animated films. Covers the techniques of flip books, drawing on film, pixilation, cut-outs and clay animation.
